item.title: Switching to Hugo
item.description: Another day, another static site generator to switch to. The curse is real. Instead of writing more blog posts, I ended up messing up with the platform. It was once powered by Jekyll. It was once using a custom static site generator that I wrote myself. It was once built on top of Gatsby. And now I’m switching to Hugoâ€”the world’s fastest static site generator. And I’m very happy with it.
